name: tacticalwp-theme
description: TacticalWP is a WordPress starter theme based on Foundationpress and Foundation 6 by Zurb

scripts.dist: git push origin dist && git branch -D dist && git push origin :dist && git checkout -B dist && rm -rf .php_cs .github/ wpcs .bowerrc .babelrc .editorconfig .eslintrc.json .travis.yml .sass-lint.yml .yo-rc.json bower.json codesniffer.ruleset.xml phpcs.xml phpunit.xml wpcs node_modules packaged/ assets/javascript/custom assets/javascript/.DS_Store assets/scss assets/.DS_Store composer.lock vendor  && composer install && rm -rf .gitignore .DS_Store assets/.DS_Store && git add -A && git commit -m $(grep -m1 version package.json | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[", ]//g') && git push origin dist && git checkout master
